column3: 2015) send sympathy card frances minni hawk
column9: 2015 at valley view alzheimers care center
column10: following an extended illness. she was born december 2
column11: 1921 in chillicothe to the late charles and elizabeth williams. on july 7
column12: 1941 she married albert arnold dick hawk
column30: louie (mildred) wyatt. she was preceded in death by her husband; two children
column31: patricia (james) marshall and frances e. hawk; and a brother
column32: eugene williams. mrs. hawk was a loving mother and grandmother. she was a graduate of unioto high school. she attended grace fellowship church. graveside funeral services will be held 10:00 am tuesday at twin township cemetery
column33: under the direction of the haller funeral home. calling hours will not be observed. print back express your condolences contact us get mobile version privacy terms of use 2010 - 2015 haller funeral home funeral home website by batesville
